channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Lightweight Accordion
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Lightweight Accordion

item.title: CVE-2023-0373|2024-08-02T05:10:55.620Z -- unknown -- lightweight%20accordion
item.description: The Lightweight Accordion WordPress plugin before 1.5.15 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
